title: Any item can't be selected in library outline view initially
description: Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the item cannot be selected the first time. Instead, the focus jumps to the library file node.
OB: When trying to select an item in the library outline view, the item cannot be selected initially. Instead, the focus jumps to the library file node.
SR: Steps to reproduce:  1. Add a label to the library file.  2. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.  3.
